Waffle chart is an interesting plot mainly used to display progress towards the goal. Github uses it to display daily efforts by its users. It has cells structure and can be used to display proportions as well ( as in the case of this visualization). Kindly upvote it if you like and comment your feedback.

Pywaffle documentation link: https://pywaffle.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html
